fields.title: d-separation
fields.pointers:
* The  [Markov blanket](markov_blanket)  is another characterization of Bayes nets in terms of conditional independencies.
* The d-separation criterion presented here is inefficient when implemented as an algorithm. The  [Bayes Ball algorithm](bayes_ball)  gives an efficient way of testing conditional independence.
fields.summary: D-separation gives a way of determining conditional independence properties in Bayes nets in terms of the graph structure. It captures an intuitive notion of the "flow" of probabilistic influence through the graph.
